name: nfima
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1

body.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, cima(c0, c1))
-| wceq(cima(c0, c1), crn(cres(c0, c1)))
-| wnfc(s0, crn(cres(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, cima(c0, c1))
-| wceq(cima(c0, c1), crn(cres(c0, c1)))
-| wnfc(s0, crn(cres(c0, c1)))

|- wnfc(s0, cima(c0, c1))
-| wnfc(s0, crn(cres(c0, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, crn(cres(c0, c1)))
-| wnfc(s0, cres(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, cima(c0, c1))
-| wnfc(s0, cres(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, cres(c0, c1))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, cima(c0, c1))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)

comment: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for image. (Contributed by NM, 30-Dec-1996.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
